A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved all the references back to the original trilogy! They were similar but still different. I still don’t really understand why Rey is looking at reflections of herself on the island. I thought that there might be something more\, like Luke facing Vader in the cavern while training with Yoda\, but no. I was surprised by Princess Leia’s role due to Carrie Fisher’s passing too. The movie was long but maybe an extended cut will be made that fleshes out some of the characters.
